text: Teodoro Enrique Pino Miranda (1 December 1946 - 2 July 2020) was a Mexican Roman Catholic bishop. Pino Miranda was born in Cucurpe, Sonora. He was ordained to the priesthood for the Archdiocese of Hermosillo in 1972. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Huajuapan de Le√≥n, Mexico, from 2001 until his death in 2020.Teodoro Enrique Pino Miranda Pino Miranda died on 2 July 2020 from cancer-related problems at a hospital in Hermosillo, Sonora at the age of 73.Muere obispo de Oaxaca Teodoro Enrique Pino, de origen sonorense ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops
title: Teodoro Enrique Pino Miranda
